duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide luxury service and product expertise for RH clientele in the Gallery.
Collaborate with RH Interior Design to meet clients' design needs and exceed expectations.
Manage all phases of the client experience from initial contact to product delivery.
Grow and maintain a strong client base.
Ensure fiscal goals are achieved and represent the RH lifestyle brand.
Maintain a strong interest in the luxury and Design industry and support visual and quality standards within the Gallery.

education_certification.credential:
Experience within a Design firm or high-end furniture and luxury retail preferred.
Art, Architecture or Interior Design and relevant experience preferred.
